title: Lux's new voice
body:
I mean, is this really necessary? What is wrong with her old voice? Was anyone asking for this? If so, how many?

This is seems like a waste of time which adds 0 value to the game or the experience of it.

replies.body: It's not a new voice actress, it's the same person, and the lines are getting added not replaced
Oh. Well, gotta say it sounds different.

They already had the actress in to record for her ultimate skin, so they just recorded new lines while she was there. More of a "This will have to get done eventually, and you are literally already in the sound room and in character."
